scripts.test_unix: AUSPICE_SERVICE_NAME=jobsservice AUSPICE_PROXY_PORT=8000 LOG4JS_CONFIG=./test/test_log4js.json LOG4JS_DISABLE_LOGSTASH=true mocha test/test.js --reporter spec
scripts.test_win: SET AUSPICE_SERVICE_NAME='jobsservice' & SET AUSPICE_PROXY_PORT='8000' & SET LOG4JS_CONFIG='.\test\test_log4js.json' & SET LOG4JS_DISABLE_LOGSTASH='true' & mocha --reporter spec
